summary: An action-comedy about a simple cook from Chandni Chowk mistaken for the reincarnation of an ancient peasant warrior Liu Shengh by residents of an oppressed Chinese village.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Mithun Chakraborty|Deepika Padukone|Ranvir Shorey|Roger Yuan|Chia-Hui Liu|Tang Tang Fei|Conan Stevens|Kevin Wu|Chang En Lu|Jun Li|Jek|Gauravv K. Chawla|Ina Vohra|Rajesh|Aslam|Harpreet Shera|Asim|Samuel Huang|Aroon Wanasbodeewong|Wan|Aakar|Gurmukh|Master Meng|Tung Aung Leng|Tia Aeng|Somboon|Raghu Khote|David Firefly|Kiran Juneja|Yuk-Ting Lau|Ian Stevens
keywords: chinese village|bound and gagged|fake pregnancy|great wall of china|separated siblings
title: Chandni Chowk to China
